DOC.brief_summary: The goal study determine 8-week dietary treatment omega-3 fatty acid docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) improve attention performance associate cortical activity metabolism 8 - 10 year old male breast-fed infancy .
DOC.brief_title: Effect 8-Week Dietary DHA Supplementation Cerebral Blood Flow Metabolic Function
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male subject age 8 10 year . 2 . Not breastfed infancy 3 . Right hand dominant 4 . Attending school appropriate grade level 5 . Normal bodymass index ( BMI ) 6 . Ability willingness provide assent inform , write consent least one biological parent . 7 . Present biological parent 8 . No current general medical psychiatric illness . 9 . Medication free . 10 . Normal intelligence assess Kaufman Brief Intelligence Test . 11 . Willingness maintain current dietary habit . 1 . Inability unwillingness provide consent . 2 . Antecedent concurrent serious medical illness . 3 . A lifetime history significant axis I psychiatric disorder ( i.e . bipolar disorder , schizophrenia ) 4 . Patients receive psychoactive medication , current lifetime . 5 . Clinically unstable medical disease , include cardiovascular , hepatic insufficiency , severe renal impairment , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , metabolic , endocrine , obesity systemic disease . 6 . History seizure , exclude febrile seizure childhood . 7 . Patients require treatment drug might obscure action study study treatment . 8 . Less normal intelligence . 9 . Pacemaker 10 . Cerebral aneurysm clip 11 . Cochlear implant 12 . Metal fragment lodge within eye 13 . Claustrophobia 14 . Necessity sedation ( sedation give ) . 15 . History loss consciousness > 10 minute duration 16 . Adopted
